product_title: Instant Pot Duo Plus 9-in-1 Multicooker, Pressure Cooker, Slow Cook, Rice Maker, Steamer, Sauté, Yogurt, Warmer & Sterilizer, Includes App With Over 800 Recipes, Stainless Steel, 6 Quarts
about_product: 9 Cooking Functions: Pressure cook, slow cook, sauté, sous vide, steam, steralize, keep warm, make rice and yogurt—all in one appliance.
Customizable Smart Programs: Tackle every recipe with 15 one-touch options, from hearty soups to decadent cakes.

Intuitive and Convenient Design: An easy-to-read display with dedicated cooking time, temperature, and pressure indicators keeps you updated in real time. And when it’s time to tuck it away, the detachable power cord makes storage easy.
Safe and Easy Steam Release: The Easy-Release steam switch ensures fast, safe, and simple steam release every time.
Good Food Done Faster: Cook up to 70% faster
Pro-Grade Cooking Pot: Crafted from durable 18/8 stainless steel with an anti-spin, tri-ply bottom—perfect for searing and sautéing like a pro.
Family-Sized Capacity: The 6-quart capacity is perfect for up to 6 servings—ideal for families, meal prep, and batch cooking.

Quick Cleanup and A Little Extra: No more fighting about who has to do the dishes. The dishwasher-safe lid and inner pot make clean up a breeze. Includes 2 extra sealing rings and a stainless steel steam rack to keep you ready for anything. :

Power-Packed Performance and Proven Peace of Mind: 1000 watts, 120 V 60 Hz, UL and ULC Listed. Features over 10 safety mechanisms, including overheat protection, an easy seal safety lid lock, and more for worry-free cooking.
Source Notes: Compared to slow cooking methods
product_description: Dinnertime chaos? Not here. The Instant Pot® Duo™ Plus pressure cooks, slow cooks, and sautés—with real-time updates and cleanup that’s dishwasher-safe.

customers_say: Customers find this pressure cooker to be a great kitchen appliance that makes perfect rice and amazing stews, with fast cooking times that cut preparation time in half. They appreciate its ease of use, with one customer noting that eggs come out very easy to peel, and find it easy to clean with just one pot to wash. Customers consider it well worth the money as a time and money saver.

top_reviews.review_comment: The Instant Pot is a total game-changer! It cooks meals fast, works as a pressure cooker, slow cooker, rice maker, and more—all in one. Easy to use, easy to clean, and perfect for busy households. I have learned how to cook so many new things.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2025

top_reviews.review_comment: The Instant Pot arrived well-packaged with all accessories included, and the quality is impressive! Functions well and no strange smell at all. I tried it for a meat stew, I just put in the meat, vegetables, along with seasonings, and it cooked in just 15 minutes—the meat came out tender, juicy, and full of flavor. It’s easy to use and saves so much time. Definitely worth it!
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2025

top_reviews.review_title: Insta Pot - Works Great - No Flaws and Hard Cooks Eggs Like no Other
top_reviews.review_comment: I should have my wife do the review - she uses it most and loves it! We mainly use it to hard cook eggs and cook rice. the best part is the rice doesn't burn or stick to the bottom - comes out perfectly every time. Also, eggs come right out of the shell and are perfectly shaped for deviled eggs. We always had trouble with half the egg coming off with the shell before - but not now. And the basket that comes with it goes on the bottom so the eggs don't get browned at all. I know there are 1000 uses for this thing, but that's what we like so far. Also, very high quality pot, very easy to clean and well made. We had a knock off first and the 'no stick' pot wasn't near as good and it burned the rice often.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2025

top_reviews.review_title: Perfect Results Every Time – Best Kitchen Appliance!
top_reviews.review_comment: The Instant Pot Duo Plus is amazing! The cooking vessel is top-notch, and everything I make comes out perfectly. It’s easy to operate, forgiving if you make a small mistake, and the food is always delicious. Excellent quality—truly the best kitchen product I’ve bought.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2025

top_reviews.review_title: Easy to use and clean but the time savings is the best part!
top_reviews.review_comment: I’m new to the instant pot game but needed a way to cook dinner faster. It’s a game changer! It’s hot out so it’s been lighter fare but I’m really looking forward to making soups and stews in it when it gets cold again. For now I’m just happy to be able to put dinner on the table fast and also not heat up the house when it’s so hot outside.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2025

top_reviews.review_title: Worth it for the pressure cooker function alone!
top_reviews.review_comment: So happy with this purchase. This multi cooker is a game changer in my kitchen. It works perfectly as both a slow cooker and the pressure cooker (I mainly use this function) and it works amazingly well. It cooks meals fast without sacrificing flavor or tenderness. Definitely one of the best appliances I've bought.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2025

top_reviews.review_comment: This review is going to be in steps, but I am impressed with the Instant Pot Duo. The most important factors of a good review are 1. packaging, 2. instructions, 3. shipping ( which has been less than agreeable ), 4. product customer service, and, 5. product performance and durability. Of the first two factors, I am very happy that this product was well packaged and the instructions are easy to understand and very well written. Plenty of diagrams and pictures and warnings, but the reading must be done before attempting to operate this pot, if you want to become proficient. And to answer anyone's question, no I am not a professional chef! I buy spices directly from the San Francisco importer for freshness which deals in pounds and put them in quart canning jars to keep them fresh longer. And my cabinet doors are off to eliminate opening and closing which is a redundant action. So, for this first review, I am very satisfied with this product and hope to produce amazing recipes. I think all kitchens should have the right appliance to do the right process. One appliance does NOT fit all cooking situations and I will continue to add. Next is getting a good Instant Pot Cookbook which comes with the territory. Stay tuned for the rest of my review; looking forward to a great experience. Thanks Amazon. I'll be back! 2nd review is ready.......Steamed Vegetables! First, I love vegetables, not that I am a vegetarian, but the benefits of steamed vegetables are enormous! Yes! I did Bok Choy, Chard, Red Onion, chicken seasoning, sea salt, garlic powder, fresh ground black pepper: 1.5 cups of water in the bottom of the Instant Pot, 2 minutes pressure cook, and beautiful. Next time, 1 minute because I like a bit of crunch on the veggies. But beautiful! Next Broccoli, Cauliflower, Green Beans, Asparagus, Collard Greens, Beets, Butternut Squash, Yellow and Acorn Squash, and any other vegetable that can be steamed! Since I love vegetables, this Instant Pot is a game-changer for Me! See you in the next review! Happy Instant Potting! This is my final review, and I think, as I have told many people, including a lot of men who are afraid to boil water, let alone get anywhere near a kitchen...............If you can read, you can cook! And this is a wonderful appliance to have in your kitchen, even for novices who can't boil water. After all, cooking is nothing more than experimentation. And it's meant to be fun. The Instant Pot does most of the work, all you have to do is read, gather the ingredients; read to set the Instant Pot, close the lid and press the appropriate button. It didn't all come to me when I first started but gradually, after reading and following trusted advise from trusted people, I was having fun and soon started creating my own vegetable dishes. (I love veggies.) It's not meant to be rocket science and with the availability of so many cookbooks, you'll wonder why you didn't sooner. That's it. I love this little appliance for the convenience and ease. And there are so many functions to do the work. It was my best buddy that convinced me to get one and I am glad I listened to him. He's been cooking for 40 years. No, he isn't a chef either but I trust his judgement! You can trust mine!
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on March 14, 2024

top_reviews.review_comment: Love the way the instant pot cooks meats, it is quick and easy cleanup
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2025

top_reviews_global.review_title: Better than a Microwave!  The New Way to Cook Nutritious, Quick Meals
top_reviews_global.review_comment: I have been using my InstantPot every night since I got it, and it has made mealtime so much easier and delicious. I can take almost anything directly out of the freezer and prepare it in minutes and have it on the table in less than an hour, including prep and additional dishes. It's quicker than going out for dinner, or ordering in, and so much healthier for you. For example, I can take a roast directly from the freezer, brown the outside in a pan with some olive oil and garlic or onions (while still frozen) then put the entire contents of the pan into the InstantPot, add a cup or two of water, set the time, and in 35 minutes, have a delicious pot roast ready and on the table. Want gravy with that? Set the pot to Saute after removing the vegetables and roast, and make your gravy directly in the InstantPot. It is so easy to set, and safe to use with it's multiple safety features, you will wonder how you managed without it before. Just like Grandma's pressure cooker, without the worry of overcooking or over-pressurizing, and it has so many multiple safeguards it's foolproof. I'm expanding what I'm preparing in it every day, with thousands or recipes online, or in cookbooks dedicated to its use. Well worth the investment, it paid for itself in less than two meals out. It's a blessing for last minute guests, hurried days with the family or making weekends more relaxing knowing dinner is only minutes away. One of the must have gifts of Christmas last year, I waited to get mine, but now I wondered why as it has made such a huge difference in preparing meals. The best appliance in my kitchen.

Estaba por comprar una olla de cocción lenta cuando la instant pot se cruzó por mi búsqueda y después de leer bastante sobre ella en internet, decidí gastar un poco más de lo que tenía planeado y la compré. Y no me arrepiento! La olla es simplemente maravillosa, especialmente para alguien como yo, que trabajo fuera de casa y tengo marido y dos niños qué alimentar. No es que la instant pot sea más rápida que una olla de presión convencional, dado que como cualquier olla de presión, hay que esperar que alcance la presión adecuada, luego está el tiempo de cocción y después la despresurización para poder abrirla, pero la GRAN diferencia es que al poderse programar simplemente te olvidas de ella y no tienes que estar vigilando nada, lo cual para alguien con muchas actividades es una magnífica ayuda. Tiene muchas funciones (cocción a presión, cocción lenta, arroz, granos, vapor, salteado, yogurt, esterilizar, etc) y el instructivo viene en inglés, francés y español. Es muy sencilla de usar y de limpiar, además de ser increíblemente silenciosa. El recetario que contiene es muy pero muy básico, pero en internet encuentras un montón de recetas súper sencillas además de que en Amazon puedes encontrar recetas en libros y Ebooks a precios muy razonables. A un mes de haberla comprado ya cociné en ella arroz, pollo, vegetales, carne, avena, arroz con leche con resultados muy satisfactorios y muy fácil. Denle una oportunidad, de verdad la van a amar. Update: Después de usar la olla por 3 meses, sigo muy satisfecha con mi compra, se cocina super fácil en ella y sobretodo sin estar cuidando nada. Lo único en contra que le encuentro, es que el aro de empaque que trae la tapa guarda el olor de lo que cocinaste. No importa con qué los laves, va a guardar el olor. Aunque eso no es un problema para cocinar, pues no vas a querer preparar una avena o unas verduras si el empaque huele a pollo o carne. La solución que le veo es comprar uno o dos empaques de repuesto y usarlos para diferentes tipos de comida, tal vez uno para cosas dulces, otra para saladas y otro para lácteos.

top_reviews_global.review_title: Gran herramienta para la cocina, para todos!
top_reviews_global.review_comment: 1. Contrario a lo que muchos podrían pensar, esta olla no representa un gasto importante de energía. De hecho es muy probable que te represente un ahorro de dinero comparado con usar gas. 2. Es muy fácil de usar. Sólo lee el instructivo anexo. También hay muchos vídeos en la red que podrán ayudarte. 3. Aunque el nombre lo insinúe, no es instantánea. De hecho, el arroz le tomará un total de unos 35 minutos para estar listo, de principio a fin. 4. Si bien en algunas preparaciones el tiempo total no será menor que en la estufa -y en otras sí-, la ventaja está en el tiempo de lo que TÚ no tienes que hacer: no tienes que cuidarla, vigilarla, ni calcular nada. Nunca tendrás que limpiar derrames ni ajustar tiempos de cocción. Una vez que aprendas cuáles son los tiempos ideales para tus recetas, estos serán los mismos siempre, con resultados consistentes, una y otra vez. 5. Hay muchas cosas que puedes hacer aquí: huevos duros, un pollo entero estilo al horno, sopas y caldos, arroz siempre perfecto... puedes freír tu arroz o sellar tus carnes y luego cerrar para cocer a presión. Puedes hacer pasteles y flanes, papas al vapor perfectas que salen como horneadas, y muchas cosas más. 6. Tiene una curva de aprendizaje. Si tienes experiencia o no en la cocina, notarás que esto es algo que sí puedes hacer. 7. Este puede ser un sustituto perfecto o una gran solución temporal si no tienes acceso a una estufa convencional: casi todo lo puedes hacer aquí!

Bought this in Aug 2019 and still going strong! Cooking with it 2 times a week and never had an issue with it. I was hoping to break so I can but I bigger one but I have no excuse. Never changed anything and never failed. I wash the bowl in the dishwasher and the lid always by hand after each use. Great product.
Buenisima! Me facilita cocinar para mi familia
